projects.title: Scriptable iOS Widgets
projects.description: A collection of Scriptable app widgets for iOS that provide useful information and functionality right on your home screen.

projects.title: Jeck Portfolio
projects.description: A unique terminal-style portfolio website that showcases skills and projects through an interactive command-line interface.

projects.title: GitHub Widget
projects.description: Track your GitHub stats — commits, contributions, Heatmap, streaks, PRs, issues, and repo insights — all beautifully displayed on your iOS home screen using Scriptable with dynamic layouts and theme support.
